mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (${icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser})
mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt, B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg from t_board A left join t_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 and A.icategory = ${icategory} order by A.iboard desc

SELECT A.iboard, A.icategory, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.hits, A.rdt, A.lastip , B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg , C.nm as categorynm FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_board_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.iboard = ${iboard}
